Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.update

Interface UpdateSession

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UpdateSessionAdapter

    public interface UpdateSession
    A single update/integrate/status session.
    See Also:
    UpdateEnvironment.updateDirectories(com.intellij.openapi.vcs.FilePath[], com.intellij.openapi.vcs.update.UpdatedFiles, com.intellij.openapi.progress.ProgressIndicator, com.intellij.openapi.util.Ref<com.intellij.openapi.vcs.update.SequentialUpdatesContext>), UpdateSessionAdapter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.lang.String getAdditionalNotificationContent()
      Returns additional information which should be displayed in the post-update notification, or null.
      java.util.List<VcsException> getExceptions()
      Returns the list of exception objects representing the errors occurred during the update/integrate/status operation, or an empty list if no errors have occurred.
      boolean isCanceled()
      Checks if the update/integrate/status information was cancelled by the user.
      void onRefreshFilesCompleted()
      Called when the VFS refresh of the files affected by an update/integrate operation is complete.
      default void showNotification()
      Show notification with results of this UpdateSession, instead of the common standard notification and the standard file tree.

    • Method Detail

      • getExceptions

        java.util.List<VcsException> getExceptions()
        Returns the list of exception objects representing the errors occurred during the update/integrate/status operation, or an empty list if no errors have occurred.
        Returns:
        the list of errors.

      • onRefreshFilesCompleted

        void onRefreshFilesCompleted()
        Called when the VFS refresh of the files affected by an update/integrate operation is complete. Can be used, for example, to show a merge dialog for files which have been merged with conflicts.

      • isCanceled

        boolean isCanceled()
        Checks if the update/integrate/status information was cancelled by the user.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was cancelled, false otherwise.

      • getAdditionalNotificationContent

        default java.lang.String getAdditionalNotificationContent()
        Returns additional information which should be displayed in the post-update notification, or null.

      • showNotification

        default void showNotification()
        Show notification with results of this UpdateSession, instead of the common standard notification and the standard file tree.
        See Also:
        UpdateEnvironment.hasCustomNotification()
